description.ko: 소리가 얼어붙은 코발트 유리의 바다를 가로지르며 보이지 않는 것이 실체가 됩니다.
description.en: The invisible becomes tangible as sound carves its path through a frozen sea of cobalt glass.

prompt: A surreal desert landscape where the sand dunes are formed from vibrating cobalt glass, sculpted into sharp wave-forms by an invisible sonic frequency. In the center, a golden core pulses with rhythmic energy, sending ripples across the glass desert. Minimal lines and visualized soundwaves intersect the horizon. Unreal Engine 5, 8k, raytracing. High-speed motion blur captures the kinetic vibration of the glass edges, with sharp focus on the central golden resonance. Cinematic lighting with dramatic shadows emphasizing the physical architecture of sound.
